body:
Did anybody here, who upgraded to windows 10 experience problems launching minecraft? If so how did you fix them?

So I start up my launcher press play annnd BAM Crash "Pixel format not accelerated" My graphics drivers are most definetly up to date.
NVidia 950 SC
Recently upgraded to windows 10
Halp
body_tagged:
Did anybody here, who upgraded to windows 10 experience problems launching minecraft? If so how did you fix them?

So I start up my launcher press play annnd BAM Crash "Pixel format not accelerated" My graphics drivers are most definetly up to date.
NVidia 950 SC
Recently upgraded to windows 10

title: MC Launcher help required

replies.body:
When I upgraded I had no problems :(

Deleted system 32? Might be a problem in some cases
replies.body_tagged:
When I upgraded I had no problems :(

Deleted system 32? Might be a problem in some cases

replies.body: I literally updated to windows 10 two days ago, and my minecraft worked fine. I remember seeing somewhere in an article that updating Java may work!
replies.body_tagged: I literally updated to windows 10 two days ago, and my minecraft worked fine. I remember seeing somewhere in an article that updating Java may work!

replies.body: Check your drivers and try a new install of java? Also make sure your ram amount is right aswell incase windows 10 uses more ram? Are u using a mods? Prehaps run without them
replies.body_tagged: Check your drivers and try a new install of java? Also make sure your ram amount is right aswell incase windows 10 uses more ram? Are u using a mods? Prehaps run without them

replies.body: I'm pretty sure that you have to update your graphics drivers. Probably your graphics drivers are up to date for whatever version you had before updating, but not for Windows 10. I know that for my Nvidia 730, I had to install graphics drivers specific to Windows 10.
replies.body_tagged: I'm pretty sure that you have to update your graphics drivers. Probably your graphics drivers are up to date for whatever version you had before updating, but not for Windows 10. I know that for my Nvidia 730, I had to install graphics drivers specific to Windows 10.

replies.body: I have had this problem before, basically try using the default Minecraft Launcher. If you are using the the default Minecraft Launcher and still have this problem then this solution is useless.
replies.body_tagged: I have had this problem before, basically try using the default Minecraft Launcher. If you are using the the default Minecraft Launcher and still have this problem then this solution is useless.

replies.body: There are multiple different lancher versions. Exe that requires java, exe that doesn't, and an installer. Try every different launcher. I had the same problem and this fixed it.
replies.body_tagged: There are multiple different lancher versions. Exe that requires java, exe that doesn't, and an installer. Try every different launcher. I had the same problem and this fixed it.

replies.body: Try the installer which is .msi. I think that should work
replies.body_tagged: Try the installer which is .msi. I think that should work

replies.body: nope i've installed all the windows 10 drivers for my card
